general_advisory: Prepare the wet nursery seed beds for paddy. Using rainwater the nursery beds may puddle 2-3 times followed by planking. Apply 200 kg of FYM, 4 kg of DAP, 2.5 kg of MOP and 1 kg of Zinc sulphate during last puddling. ...

advisory: Pre-sowing - Nursery Management: Divide nursery area into smaller plots of convenient length. Irrigation channels should be made along the beds for irrigation/drainage purpose. Seed treatment should be done before sowing.
Harvesting and planting is under progress.

Vegetative - Control yellow mosaic virus by spraying triazophos or acetamipride.

Vegetative to curd formation stage - Control Alternaria with carbendazim + mancozeb.
